# Project Requirements Document

## Overview
This document outlines the requirements for the Sample Project.

## Functional Requirements

### FR-001: User Authentication
- Users must be able to login with email and password
- Support for OAuth 2.0 (Google, GitHub)
- Session timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity

### FR-002: User Dashboard
- Display user profile information
- Show recent activity
- List pending tasks

### FR-003: Order Management
- Create new orders
- Edit existing orders (within 24 hours)
- Cancel orders (before shipping)

## Non-Functional Requirements

### NFR-001: Performance
- Page load time < 3 seconds
- API response time < 500ms
- Support 1000 concurrent users

### NFR-002: Security
- All data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3)
- Passwords hashed with bcrypt
- SQL injection prevention

## Business Rules

### BR-001: Order Cancellation
Orders can only be cancelled within 24 hours of creation and before shipping status.

### BR-002: Premium Users
Premium users get extended cancellation window of 48 hours.

### BR-003: Refund Policy
Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

## Entities

### User
- id: UUID
- email: string
- name: string
- role: enum (admin, user, premium)
- created_at: datetime

### Order
- id: UUID
- user_id: UUID
- status: enum (pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled)
- total: decimal
- created_at: datetime
